attributes.title: This isn’t Frito Lay ): Horrible, misleading marketing
attributes.review: I thought I downloaded the Frito Lay app to check out their Fritos, but all I could see were the orange Cheetos. So confusing. Where my Fritos at?

attributes.title: SCAM
attributes.review: i have no idea how, but they took my credit card info. i entered no info so i have to wait to get all new credit cards. thanks trump 😕

attributes.title: Horrible app
attributes.review: Too many glitches. And all I could see in my screen was a Cheeto with corn hair. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: The worst app ever
attributes.review: I got the app and my phone started not working and getting weird ads, I do not recommend this app to anyone DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! Never again will I do this

attributes.title: Rate this 1 star! Sickening !
attributes.review: I can’t believe it! They hacked and got my grannys onlyfans info! She gotta return to the streets! She’s 83 man cmon now! She was making such good money too! I can’t. These lying Cheeto sucking peepee fakes! Help my granny y’all 😤

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: I have nothing else to say. It is a complete waste of time and a scam. They get all of your information and continue to pressure you into fighting against Democrats.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: They said I didn’t matter and when I asked why they said because. Just because 😭🥴

attributes.title: Wow!
attributes.review: This is a terrible app! Don’t waste your time! This app is ran a sociopath, orange looking, rapist, child predator, racist, African American/Mexican hating, bad hair having, Obama hating l, poor excuse of a man. So take this this advice from me and don’t get this app.❤️

attributes.title: Not worth your time!!!🤢
attributes.review: If i could give this app a negative rating i would. I showed to to my grandma and she was so disgusted she died on the spot!! you’ll be hearing from my lawyer mr. president!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER‼️🙅🏻‍♀️
attributes.review: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!! my phone was hacked as soon as i downloaded it, then it started to heat up at an alarmingly fast pace which cause it to eventually burst into flames and set my house on fire!! this app is a DANGER TO THE PEOPLE❗️For the love of god DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! 🤢🤧😭
